title: The Nashville Bombing: Why Did This Happen? | Guest: Justin Barclay | 12/28/20
description:
Justin Barclay fills in for Glenn Beck and immediately starts breaking down the Christmas Day bombing in Nashville. What was the bomber’s motive? Why did he attempt to minimize casualties? Reporter Robyn Walensky joins the program to shed some light on this story and give you the latest from Georgia ahead of the Senate runoff elections. In Hour Two, Justin plays a clip of a struggling restaurant owner mobilizing others in the industry with an impassioned speech. Then, Dr. David Samadi, author of "The Ultimate MANual," joins the program to sift through the tangled web of ineffective bans, scaremongering, and outright lies that have defined the COVID-19 pandemic. Also, when you’re told to stand up for your rights, what does that mean?
